page.title: 10COLN VALLEY FISH & GAME CO.
page.content: This firm has been in existence for about 10 years and is owned by a local farmer. Its main complex is the Corner Barn in Winson and adjacent farm buildings. It provides employment for 15 people with additional casual work at the busiest times. Its main object is the processing and storage of local produce such as pheasants and venison, and in addition special foods such as salmon which is sent down from Scotland. Other products are also kept under refrigeration, mainly to increase the range. Fish and game comprise two thirds of the business, but the smokery, in a local stone kiln where dried sawdust is used, is becoming increasingly important. The main outlet for this specialised produce is hotels, some local and others within a 50 mile radius.
